titleInfo.title: Louder than words : lawyers, communities and the struggle for justice : a report to the Rockefeller Foundation

mods.abstract: Contents: 1. From triage to transformation: the Texas Ten Percent Plan helps restore racial diversity to the college campus -- 2. Client-centered lawyering: garment worker advocacy in Los Angeles -- 3. Seizing a voice in democracy: the Mississippi redistricting campaign -- 4. Rerouting the revenue: Los Angeles community residents take on the transit authority to get bus service that meets their needs -- 5. Prayer and protest: bringing a community vision of justice to a labor dispute -- 6. Reflections on community lawyering: the struggle for Parcel C -- 7. Emerging patterns and lessons from the field -- 8. Renegotiating issues of race.
